short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically sets Yahoo for secure searches, protecting every search query with HTTPS and advanced security.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Secure your online searches with the Secure Search Extension, specifically designed to prioritize your privacy and data security. By setting a privacy-focused search engine as your default, this extension ensures that all your search activities are conducted over HTTPS, utilizing secure servers and networks to safeguard against data breaches and unauthorized access.

Key Features:

Enhanced Privacy: Redirects all searches through a secure search engine that doesn't track or store your search history.
Data Security: Utilizes HTTPS and secure network protocols to protect your searches and personal information.
Easy Integration: Simple setup to quickly secure your browser, enhancing protection without compromising performance.
For further details and to review our data protection policies, please visit our website:
 https://secure.reminderappz.com
